data.title: Proclamation No. 1336
data.meta_description: Proclamation - DECLARING SATURDAY, 23 APRIL 2022, A SPECIAL (NON-WORKING) DAY IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF PLARIDEL, PROVINCE OF BULACAN
data.text:
MALACAÑAN PALACE

MANILA

BY THE PRESIDENT OF THE PHILIPPINES

[ PROCLAMATION NO. 1336, April 05, 2022 ]

DECLARING SATURDAY, 23 APRIL 2022, A SPECIAL (NON-WORKING) DAY IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF PLARIDEL, PROVINCE OF BULACAN

WHEREAS, on 22 April 2022, Saturday, the Municipality of Plaridel, Province of Bulacan, will mark the celebration of the Battle of Quingua;

WHEREAS, the Battle of Quingua was fought om 23 April 1899 in Plaridel, Bulacan, wherein the Filipino forces under the command of General Gregorio del Pilar, and was one of the most significant victories of the Filipinos in the Philippine-American war; and

WHEREAS, it is but fitting and that the people of the Municipality of Plaridel be given the full opportunity to celebrate and participate in the occasion with appropriate ceremonies, subject to public health measures of the national government;

NOW, THEREFORE, I, SALVADOR C. MEDIALDEA, Executive Secretary, by the authority of the President, RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE, do hereby declare Saturday, 23 April 2022, a special (non-working) day in the Municipality of Plaridel, Province of Bulacan,

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand and caused the seal of the Republic of the Philippines to be affixed.

Done in the City of Manila, this 5th day of April, in the year of Our Lord, Two Thousand and Twenty Two.

By authority of the President

(SGD.) SALVADOR C. MEDIALDEA

Executive Secretary
